Posts.Content: Age 59. feb 6,2014 surgery. Davinci Robotic. Geason 3+4. Stage pT2, pN0. My 1st follow up psa March 20 <0.02; June 20, psa 0.02; September 18 psa 0.06. my concern is the obvious rise in psa. Although significantly below .2 warning level. Any thoughts on this increase and or recomendations. Thank you. Rob
Posts.Signature: Age 59 Robotic prostatectomy Feb. 6, 2014. Clean margins, psa [email protected] surgery 3.9, Gleason 7 (3+4), path report from biopsy (4+3). Extent of involvement by tumor: Moderately involved, unilaterally (right side), 14%. Pathologic stage (TNM): pT2, pN0, Lymph-vascular invasion: not identified. Psa: March 20, 2014 <.02 June 20, 2014 .02 September 20, 2014 psa .06 November 20 2014, psa .08 Jan 20,201, psa .12
Posts.Title: negligible rise in psa post surgery

Posts.Content: I've been told, my only option is a radical prostatectomy. Has anyone taken a different approach? My most recent psa 2 weeks before biopsy is 4.35. My biopsy revealed 4/16 cores 4+3=7 w/ perineural invasion and 1/16, 4+3=7 w/o pni. All 5 cores were from 3 right apex and 1 right mid medial and 1 lateral foci. Capsule appears intact.
Posts.Title: Just Dx w/ gleason 4+3=7.

Posts.Content: Thank you for the paactusa link. A few points, my prostate size is I believe normal @ 26cc. How do I apply all the specifics of my results as a tag to my threads? Last, I've been reading very current research relating to beta blockers and decrease in rate of micro spread of prostate cancer cells after a radical prostatectomy. Thank you. http://www.sciencemag.org/content/341/6142/1236361.short[/URL]
Posts.Title: Just Dx w/ gleason 4+3=7.

Posts.Content: Hello all and thankyou for your responses. I will certainly go for 2nd opinions. I am 58 yrs. In good health. Father died of metastatic prostate cancer. As described above 5/16 cores + Gleason 4+3=7. All on right lobe. Tuesday 12/31/2013 I will have 1st consult w David Samadi MD, robotic prostatectomy. Has anyone heard of or researched Robert Leibowitz MD (los angeles) "Triple Hormone Blockade" approach? Thanks again.
Posts.Title: Just Dx w/ gleason 4+3=7.

Posts.Content: Thursday 2/6/2014 scheduled to have davinci robotic prostatectomy with Dr. David Samadi. Has anyone requested tumor sample to forward to Caris L.S. to perform a chemo sensitivity on prostate cancer? The information is to arm us with a treatment plan of chemo if there is ever pca mets in the future.
